member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessor.GetContentDesc
member.summary: Gets the content description that was used to create the video processor.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the content description.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessor.GetRateConversionCaps
member.summary: Gets the rate conversion capabilities of the video processor.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the rate conversion capabilities.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessor
member.summary: Represents a video processor for Microsoft Direct3D 11.
